sourcesContent:
<script>
export default {
  name: 'DashboardPage',  // <-- เปลี่ยนจาก Dashboard เป็น DashboardPage
  data() {
    return {
      courses: [],
      newCourse: ''
    };
  },
  async mounted() {
    await this.fetchCourses();
  },
  methods: {
    async fetchCourses() {
      const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
      const res = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/courses', {
        headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
      });
      this.courses = res.data;
    },
    async addCourse() {
      const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
      await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:8000/courses', 
        { course_name: this.newCourse },
        { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` } }
      );
      this.newCourse = '';
      await this.fetchCourses();
    }
  }
};
</script>
